doc.title: Forever Young
doc.plot: Forever Young is the story of two friends in their last week of high school. Chris Peterson is the all-American kid who, with his best friend Sean Parker, a rebel, is enjoying his last days of innocence in high school. It's Saturday night and their friend Kevin is throwing the "PARTY OF THE YEAR." But, unfortunately, on this night everyone at their school would experience first hand the pain and emotion of loosing a friend to drinking and driving.
